name: Plansee Holding AG
goal: We develop, produce and market products based on the high-tech materials molybdenum and tungsten. Our production technologies cover every aspect of the value-added chain. Our customer care, development and production operations are geared to the demands of our markets. Each individual market defines the requirements in respect of the characteristics of our products.
interests: Customs, Internal Market, Research and Technology, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives:
Conflict minerals regulation and trilogue process, Market Economy Status China.The New transparency requirements for companies
Review of the Code of Conduct on Business Taxation

The Code of Conduct on Business Taxation

Tax Avoidance Package
